#summary List of Future Plans for jqKeyPad

= List of Future Plans for jqKeyPad=


 * Support full keyboard - in progress
 * Support events so users can create their own functionality without changing the plugin - in progress
 * KeyPad popup support for use in kiosks
 * JQuery UI style support
 * Ability to switch between keyboards (ie. Shift of Caps Lock)

==Completed Changes==
 * Initialization parameters to allow user to change KeyPad configuration
 * NumberPad has variable precision support
